channel.title: Nightmares on The Big Ugly House Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Nightmares on The Big Ugly House Blog

item.title: Gros Morne Justice: Chapter 2
item.description: Plot Summary In Chapter 2, Jack receives word that he is to be held responsible for Rick’s illegal killing of the bear cub. This puts his business at risk, and puts him in a precarious financial position. He also has funeral costs for Calvin to consider. He discusses funeral arrangements with Norm, who pushes for cremation. He also offers to perform Calvin’s ceremony for free, and offers Jack a job at the funeral home.

item.title: Gros Morne Justice: Part 2 (UPDATE)
item.description: We did some digging to find out more about Ed Asner, of the mysterious celebrity review.   ED ASNER IS A 911 TRUTHER what does it mean terrorism doesn’t rhyme with bearorism for no reason What is the connection between bears and 911? This is the central question here.

item.title: Gros Morne Justice: Part 2 (Celebrity review)
item.description: The plot thickens before we even begin the story itself. The very first page of the book, a review by Ed Asner, actor, hints at the dark secrets within. “What a provocative idea! I found the novel fascinating … an intriguing story. It bears (no pun intended) not only further reading, but further investigation. A cautionary note: Don’t have anyone read this book to President George Bush and Homeland Security.

item.title: An exciting oval shape
item.description: Egg person? Egg Person??!! Are you trying to give me nightmares?
